scripts.dev: bun run build && screenly edge-app run
scripts.build: bun run build:css && bun run build:js
scripts.build:js: bun build src/main.ts --outdir static/js --target browser --format iife
scripts.lint: bash -c 'OUTPUT=$(tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck index.ts index.test.ts src/fetcher.ts src/fetcher.test.ts src/main.ts 2>&1 | grep -v edge-apps-library); if [ -n "$OUTPUT" ]; then echo "$OUTPUT"; exit 1; fi'
scripts.deploy: bun run build && screenly edge-app deploy
